You may pay-by-phone using our automated phone number 24/7 @ 1.888.409.2849. Please have your account number and card information. WE DO NOT ACCEPT ACH PAYMENTS.

Ordinances
----------

### City Ordinances

Please be aware that the following ordinances have been passed by the City Council.

If these ordinances are violated in any way, it may lead to prosecution. Please take the time and read through them if you are unsure of any situations you may fall under.

###### Displaying House Numbers 274.33 KB

[Download Now](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Ordinance-Displaying-House-Numbers.pdf)

###### Ordinance 270-19 Sex Offenders Restrictions 937.70 KB

[Download Now](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Ordinance-270-19-Sex-Offenders-Restrictions-2.pdf)

###### Ordinance 269-19 2011 Fee Schedule 1.45 MB

[Download Now](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Ordinance-269-19-2011-Fee-Schedule.pdf)

###### Ordinance 035-89 – Prohibiting Discharging of Weapons 49.27 KB

[Download Now](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Ordinance-035-89-Prohibiting-Discharging-of-Weapons.pdf)

###### Ordinance 030-88 – Prohibiting Fireworks 91.03 KB

[Download Now](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Ordinance-030-88-Prohibiting-Fireworks.pdf)

###### Ordinance 029-88 – Prohibiting Burning 57.85 KB

[Download Now](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Ordinance-029-88-Prohibiting-Burning.pdf)

[![city of Hackberry (1)](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/city-of-Hackberry-1.png "city of Hackberry (1)")](https://cityofhackberry.net/)

Hackberry is a town in Denton County,  
Texas, United States. The population was  
2,973 in 2020.

##### Hours of Operation

### Mon-Fri

08:00 AM-05:00 PM

### Sat-Sun

Closed
